All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AddAppointment
This class will allow the user to add appointments with all the different criteria such as times, dates, and people associated with the appointment.
AddCustomer
This class allows the user to add customers with all the different criteria such as times, dates, and people associated with the customer.
Appointments
This class stores all of the appointment objects used in the app.
AppointmentsDAO
This class has all of the SQL commands used by the app for accessing and making any changes to the database for appointments.
ApptsTypeMonthReport
This class will display the appointments in the database by type and month.
ConcatMessage
Lambda used to concatenate the notification displayed to the user at login of any appointments upcoming within 15 minutes.
ContactList
This class stores the contact list objects stored in the database.
Contacts
This class stores all of the contacts objects used in the app.
ContactsDAO
This class has all of the SQL commands used by the app for accessing and making any changes to the database for contacts.
ContactsReport
This class will display the contact party's information from within the stored appointment information.
Controller
 
Countries
This class stores all of the countries objects used in the app.
CountriesDAO
This class has all of the SQL commands used by the app for accessing and making any changes to the database for countries.
CurrentTimeLambda
Lambda used to convert the time to the current local date time.
CustomerIDReport
This class will display the totals of the appointments by customer ID.
CustomerIDReport
This class contacts the Customer ID objects to be used for the reports within the app.
Customers
This class stores all of the customers objects used in the app.
CustomerScreen
This class stores all of the information of the customers and displays that to the user.
CustomersDAO
This class has all of the SQL commands used by the app for accessing and making any changes to the database for customers.
Divisions
This class stores all of the Divisions objects used in the app.
DivisionsDAO
This class has all of the SQL commands used by the app for accessing and making any changes to the database for divisions (region).
JDBC
This method allows the user to connect to the MySQL database which stores all of the appointments/customer data.
LoginScreen
This class brings up the login screen for the user to input their credentials and either successfully or unsuccessfully connect to the database.
Main
This class creates an app that will allow a user to schedule appointments with different parameters and accurately keep track of the times that are input.
MainAppointmentScreen
This class shows all of the appointments stored in the system and allows the user to make multiple choices for editing or going to other pages in the app.
ModifyAppointment
This class allows the user to make changes to existing appointments in the app.
ModifyCustomer
This class allows the user to modify a selected customer's data.
ReportsMenu
This class displays the Reports menu to the user for them to choose the different types of reports.
User
This class stores all of the User objects used in the app.
UserDAO
This class has all of the SQL commands used by the app for accessing and making any changes to the database for users (login users).
WelcomeMessage
Lambda to generate a welcome message in the terminal.
